Articles.Content:
I really like the idea of SSTO's and got very excited a small great mod as spaceplane+ got integrated. But I want a little more. I know about B9 but i think it's bad because half of it is big bulky parts and next to that it's just too much... secondly, they don't support stock aerodynamics and you need FAR or NEAR wich dont work out for me, everything always wobbles no matter how i fly it. Silliest mods ever if you ask me I instantly deleted them. Are there any other good mods besides B9?

Thanks in advance.

Edited November 10, 2014 by Kaname

B9 supposedly does work properly with stock aero, the modders just don't offer support assistance for stock aerodynamics users. K3|Chris, one of the contributors to B9, pointed this out to me when I was under the same mistaken impression.

You might also look at Large Diameter Space Plane Parts, though it is still a work in progress.

Ah i indeed thought it would be "broken" without FAR or NEAR. Maybe i judged B9 too hasty. And maybe shrink it down a little myself. More spaceplane mod suggestions are welcome.

Thanks for the heads up.

Edited November 10, 2014 by Kaname
